# Crypto Trading Bot Template

This directory contains a comprehensive template for building automated cryptocurrency trading bots using Claude Force.

## Documentation

- **[Quick Start Guide](CRYPTO_TRADING_BOT_QUICKSTART.md)** - Get started quickly with the crypto bot template
- **[Implementation Tasks](CRYPTO_BOT_IMPLEMENTATION_TASKS.md)** - Detailed implementation checklist and tasks
- **[Security Guide](CRYPTO_TRADING_BOT_SECURITY.md)** - Security best practices and considerations
- **[Examples](CRYPTO_TRADING_BOT_EXAMPLES.md)** - Example configurations and use cases
- **[DevOps Review](CRYPTO_TRADING_BOT_DEVOPS_REVIEW.md)** - Comprehensive DevOps architecture and deployment guide
- **[Updated Plan](CRYPTO_TRADING_BOT_UPDATED_PLAN.md)** - Latest implementation plan and roadmap

## Overview

This template provides:
- Multi-agent architecture for trading decisions
- Risk management and portfolio optimization
- Real-time market data integration
- Backtesting capabilities
- Security-first design
- Production-ready deployment configuration

## Getting Started

1. Read the [Quick Start Guide](CRYPTO_TRADING_BOT_QUICKSTART.md)
2. Review the [Security Guide](CRYPTO_TRADING_BOT_SECURITY.md)
3. Follow the [Implementation Tasks](CRYPTO_BOT_IMPLEMENTATION_TASKS.md)
4. Check [Examples](CRYPTO_TRADING_BOT_EXAMPLES.md) for reference implementations

## Security Warning

⚠️ **IMPORTANT**: Trading bots handle real money. Always:
- Start with paper trading
- Implement comprehensive testing
- Follow security best practices
- Use proper risk management
- Never expose API keys

See the [Security Guide](CRYPTO_TRADING_BOT_SECURITY.md) for detailed security requirements.
